response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds significant importance and relevance to you, just like it does to us. Considering its immense worth to both parties, we are offering this remarkable item to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This offer is not only a testament to our commitment to providing unparalleled service but also an opportunity for you to secure a high-quality asset at a highly competitive rate. We believe this price reflects the true value of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of concluding this transaction with you.", "product_price": 750000}
